alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:53AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Pasco, northeastern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1153 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palm Harbor to near Tampa International Airport. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Temple Terrace, Lutz, Brandon, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, Citrus Park, Lake Magdalene, Palm Harbor and Feather Sound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
